name: Twisted Runner
description:
Make sure to enable browsers hardware acceleration  We Highly Recommend playing the Windows Build as it is a lot more stable Controls:-

A and D to move the Ball

ESC to Quit

Game:-

This is your casual endless runner but with a twist!

The  GOLD  colored obstacles are your normal type obstacles 

Your  Objective is to  Dodge  them

However the BLACK  colored obstacles have a twist

Enjoy!

Made By:-

Shivansh Ahuja - Programmer

Harsh Pal - Art

Made for the BYOG game jam 2022
